this_title: Dark Light: The Art of Blind Photographers
trans_title: 黑暗之光：盲人摄影师的艺术
introduction: Can vision succeed where eyesight fails? Can a blind person make meaningful photographs? How can the creator appreciate his own work? This film explores the artistry and innovation of Pete Eckert, Bruce Hall, and Henry Butler, blind photographers whose luminous work can help us see the world through their eyes.
chinese_title: 黑暗之光：盲人摄影师的艺术
foreign_title: Dark Light: The Art of Blind Photographers
